title: 123p land for sale
details:
- 123 perch rectangular shaped flat land.

- 130m from the main 120-Colombo-Horana bus route.

- 950m (minutes away) from the Boralesgamuwa junction.

- 20 feet wide road access to the property, and 20-feet two lane traffic on the main road which connects on to the Dehiwala-Maharagama road.

- Ideal for industrial or commercial building or factory complex.

- Buildable area of 75-perch & 48-perch reservation (Excusively for this property)
